text.en: Oṃ āḥ hūṃ
text.en-trans: om ah hung

text.en: To the dharmakāya Samantabhadra and consort, I pray!
text.en-trans: chöku kunzang yabyum la solwa depso

text.en: To the lord of the sixth family, the great Vajradhara, I pray!
text.en-trans: drukpa dorje changchen la solwa depso

text.en: To the teacher Vajrasattva, I pray!
text.en-trans: tönpa dorje sempa la solwa depso

text.en: To thevidyādharaGarab Dorje, I pray!
text.en-trans: rigdzin garab dorje la solwa depso

text.en: To Guru Śrī Siṃha, I pray!
text.en-trans: guru shiri singha la solwa depso

text.en: To the eight vidyādharas of India, I pray!
text.en-trans: gagar rigdzin gyepo la solwa depso

text.en: To the deathless Padmākara, I pray!
text.en-trans: chimé pema jungné la solwa depso

text.en: To the princess Mandāravā, I pray!
text.en-trans: lhacham mandarawa la solwa depso

text.en: To the king and subjects, the twenty-five disciples, I pray!
text.en-trans: jé bang nyi shu tsa nga la solwa depso

text.en: To the one hundred and eight treasure-revealers, I pray!
text.en-trans: tertön gya dang tsa gyé la solwa depso

text.en: To the gracious root and lineage gurus, I pray!
text.en-trans: drinchen tsa gyü lama la solwa depso

text.en: To the forty-two peaceful deities, I pray!
text.en-trans: zhiwa zhibchu tsa nyi la solwa depso

text.en: To the pure vidyādhara and consort, I pray!
text.en-trans: dakpa rigdzin yabyum la solwa depso

text.en: To the fifty blazing herukas, I pray!
text.en-trans: barwa traktung ngabchu la solwa depso

text.en: To the five classes of dharma-keeping ḍākinīs, I pray!
text.en-trans: chödak khandro dé nga la solwa depso

text.en: To the ocean of oath-bound protectors, I pray!
text.en-trans: kasung damchen gyatso la solwa depso

text.en: Inspire me with your blessings, so that I may directly seedharmatāreality!
text.en-trans: chönyi ngön sum tongwar chin gyi lop shik

text.en: Inspire me with your blessings, so that visionary experiences may develop and increase!
text.en-trans: nyam nang gong du pelwar chin gyi lop shik

text.en: Inspire me with your blessings, so that pure awareness may reach its full measure!
text.en-trans: rigpa tsé pebpar chin gyi lop shik

text.en: Inspire me with your blessings, so that I may attain the stage of exhaustion intodharmatā!
text.en-trans: chönyi zésar khyolwar chin gyi lop shik

text.en: Inspire me with your blessings, so that I may accomplish the rainbow body!
text.en-trans: jalü khachö drubpar chin gyi lop shik

text.en: Inspire me with your blessings, so that I may perfect the great transference!
text.en-trans: powa chenpo jongpar chin gyi lop shik

text.en: Inspire me with your blessings, so that I may attain buddhahood in a single lifetime!
text.en-trans: tsé chik sangyé drubpar chin gyi lop shik
